articles.description: Rascal Flatts announced their 2025 Life Is a Highway Tour, which marks the band's 25th anniversary.
articles.content: Rascal Flatts have announced their Life Is a Highway Tour, ahead of the country band’s 25th anniversary. The 21-date trek, named after the country trio’s 2006 hit “Life Is a Highway,” starts on Feb. … [+1666 chars]

articles.title: ‘Beverly Hills Cop’ star, Springfield native dies at 76 - MassLive.com
articles.description: An actor from Massachusetts who played an essential part in the “Beverly Hills Cops” movies has died.
articles.content:
A veteran actor from Massachusetts who was a part of the iconic trio in the Beverly Hills Cops movies has died. He was 76.
